text: Raven-Symoné, Navia Robinson, Sky Katz and Issac Ryan Brown from Disney Channel's "Raven's Home" head to the Gallery of Online Regret. Raven explains that anything said online lives forever, which means you can apologize but you can't make anything disappear. That's why Raven says it's important to have common sense and ask a parent for help when you post.
title: Common Sense Media TV Spot, 'Disney Channel: Gallery of Online Regret' Featuring Raven-Symoné
